qas.question: In what time span were the theories to integrate molecular genetic with Darwinian evolution developed?
What are the theories that integrate molecular genetics with Darwinian evolution called?
Who proposed an evolutionary concept of the gene as a unit of natural selection?

answers.text: "that which segregates and recombines with appreciable frequency."

qas.question: Who popularized ideas emphasizing the centrality of genes in evolution?
